titleStmt.title: The arts and pernicious designs of Rome wherein is shewn what are the aims of the Jesuits & friers, and what means they use to obtain them, to the prejudice of this nation and the future involving it in misery, together with some proposals to prevent the same / by a person of their own communion, who turned romanist about thirty years since.
titleStmt.author: N. N.

titleStmt.title: The arts and pernicious designs of Rome wherein is shewn what are the aims of the Jesuits & friers, and what means they use to obtain them, to the prejudice of this nation and the future involving it in misery, together with some proposals to prevent the same / by a person of their own communion, who turned romanist about thirty years since.
titleStmt.author: N. N.

notesStmt.note: Caption title : The sentiments of N.N. touching the Roman consistories, designs and practices, & c.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

person.persName: N. N., loyal subject of the Roman Catholick communion.
